ITEM_0000.name: Potion
ITEM_0000.expl: Restores a small amount of health.

ITEM_0001.name: Mega Potion
ITEM_0001.expl: Restores a moderate amount of health.

ITEM_0003.name: Max Potion
ITEM_0003.expl: Fully restores health and temporarily maximizes the size of your Health Gauge.

ITEM_0005.name: Nulberry
ITEM_0005.expl: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ITEM_0006.name: Ration
ITEM_0006.expl: Food that restores a bit of stamina. It can also be used on the Portable BBQ Grill to have a meal.

ITEM_0007.name: Well-done Steak
ITEM_0007.expl: A hearty roast that restores health and stamina and boosts both their max gauges. So tasty!

ITEM_0008.name: Rare Steak
ITEM_0008.expl: Restores health and stamina and moderately increases the size of your Health Gauge temporarily.

ITEM_0009.name: Burnt Meat
ITEM_0009.expl: Restores stamina, but it may be a bit too charred to provide any healing effects...

ITEM_0010.name: Lifepowder
ITEM_0010.expl: Produces a cloud that heals you and anyone nearby.

ITEM_0011.name: Raw Meat
ITEM_0011.expl: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined, or used to set a trap.

ITEM_0013.name: Large Barrel Bomb
ITEM_0013.expl: A bomb that can be rolled after placing it on the ground. Strike it to trigger a powerful blast.

ITEM_0014.name: Flash Pod
ITEM_0014.expl: Slinger ammo that causes a violent flash on impact. Will temporarily blind monsters if used in front of them.

ITEM_0015.name: Stone
ITEM_0015.expl: Slinger ammo that can be used to hit faraway plant life and bombs.

ITEM_0016.name: Capture Net
ITEM_0016.expl: A net that can be fired from your Slinger. Use it to capture small creatures.

ITEM_0017.name: Pitfall Trap
ITEM_0017.expl: A trap for catching large monsters. It is tripped by heavy weight.

ITEM_0018.name: Shock Trap
ITEM_0018.expl: A trap that immobilizes a target. Use it to capture monsters.

ITEM_0019.name: Whetstone
ITEM_0019.expl: A standard-sized whetstone. Use it to restore a weapon's sharpness.

ITEM_0021.name: Binoculars
ITEM_0021.expl: A tool that magnifies distant objects and lets you learn more about them.

ITEM_0022.name: Camping Kit
ITEM_0022.expl: A kit with all the tools to make camp. Use to set up and edit Pop-up Camps in available locations.

ITEM_0023.name: Portable BBQ Grill
ITEM_0023.expl: A portable BBQ grill that can be used for grilling up raw meat and other ingredients.

ITEM_0027.name: Honey
ITEM_0027.expl: Highly nutritious honey. Combine with potions to make the more potent mega potion.

ITEM_0028.name: Bitterbug Broth
ITEM_0028.expl: Bitter essence from an insect with innate healing abilities. Used as a component in many medicines.

ITEM_0029.name: Flashbug Phosphor
ITEM_0029.expl: Luminous essence from an insect that emits a powerful flash when it dies. Used to craft Flash Pods.

ITEM_0030.name: Godbug Essence
ITEM_0030.expl: Essence from an insect said to live a millennium. Combine it with other items to add their properties.

ITEM_0031.name: Thunderbug Capacitor
ITEM_0031.expl: Substance from an insect that emits electricity when struck. Required to craft Shock Traps and Thunder Ammo.

ITEM_0036.name: Beast Gem
ITEM_0036.expl: A valuable jewel formed from coagulated juices inside a monster. Glows wildly.

ITEM_0037.name: Normal Ammo
ITEM_0037.expl: Standard ammo. Fires multiple shots with each pull of the trigger. Unlimited capacity.

ITEM_0040.name: Pierce Ammo
ITEM_0040.expl: Armor-piercing ammo. Depending on the monster, it can deal multiple hits. Unlimited capacity.

ITEM_0043.name: Spread Ammo
ITEM_0043.expl: Ammo made for close combat. Short range but high power. Unlimited capacity.

ITEM_0046.name: Sticky Ammo
ITEM_0046.expl: Powerful ammo that lodges in a target and explodes. Headshots stun.

ITEM_0049.name: Cluster Bomb
ITEM_0049.expl: Ammo that fragments into multiple shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!

ITEM_0052.name: Flaming Ammo
ITEM_0052.expl: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to fire.

ITEM_0053.name: Water Ammo
ITEM_0053.expl: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to water.

ITEM_0054.name: Thunder Ammo
ITEM_0054.expl: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to thunder.

ITEM_0055.name: Freeze Ammo
ITEM_0055.expl: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to ice.

ITEM_0056.name: Dragon Ammo
ITEM_0056.expl: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters weak to dragon.

ITEM_0057.name: Poison Ammo
ITEM_0057.expl: Ammo that inflicts poison. Some targets require multiple shots in order for the status to take effect.

ITEM_0059.name: Paralysis Ammo
ITEM_0059.expl: Ammo that causes paralysis. Some targets require multiple shots in order for the status to take effect.

ITEM_0061.name: Sleep Ammo
ITEM_0061.expl: Ammo that induces sleep. Some targets require multiple shots in order for the status to take effect.

ITEM_0068.name: Slicing Ammo
ITEM_0068.expl: Ammo that ejects sharp blades on impact, which can sever tails.

ITEM_0072.name: Thorngrass Pod
ITEM_0072.expl: Slinger ammo that lodges into a target. Attacking where it's lodged deals extra damage.

ITEM_0074.name: Iron Ore
ITEM_0074.expl: Ore that can be smelted into a multi-purpose metal.

ITEM_0075.name: Machalite Ore
ITEM_0075.expl: Ore mined from mineral veins. Refined Machalite Steel is far sturdier than its iron cousin.

ITEM_0078.name: Earth Crystal
ITEM_0078.expl: Crystallized microbes sourced from mining outcrops. Coveted as an abrasive for polishing equipment.

ITEM_0079.name: Mystery Bone
ITEM_0079.expl: Weathered bone taken from a bonepile. Erosion has left it too fragile to use in crafting.

ITEM_0080.name: Sturdy Bone
ITEM_0080.expl: A rigid bone taken from a bonepile. Durable but light and easy to handle.

ITEM_0082.name: Colossal Bone
ITEM_0082.expl: A massive bone from a beast. Carefully cut out and used for crafting.

ITEM_0083.name: Dragonbone Relic
ITEM_0083.expl: A high-quality bone gathered from bonepiles. The remains of a dragon that once roamed these lands.

ITEM_0087.name: Mandragora
ITEM_0087.expl: A dangerous fungus said to draw the life out of people. Required to craft Immunizers and Max Potions.

ITEM_0088.name: Blue Mushroom
ITEM_0088.expl: A mushroom infused with power-enhancing effects. Used in restorative items.

ITEM_0090.name: Burst Pod
ITEM_0090.expl: Slinger ammo that detonates on impact. Use it to stagger a monster when you're in a pinch.

ITEM_0091.name: Screamer Pod
ITEM_0091.expl: Used as ammo for your Slinger. Emits a harsh, high-frequency sound that can disrupt sensitive monsters.

ITEM_0092.name: Bleeding Pod
ITEM_0092.expl: Slinger ammo that can be used to inflict massive damage on monster wounds.

ITEM_0093.name: Dung Pod
ITEM_0093.expl: Slinger ammo that releases a strong odor on impact. Causes certain monsters to flee.

ITEM_0096.name: Trap Tool
ITEM_0096.expl: A must-have item for putting together pitfall traps and shock traps.

ITEM_0098.name: Smokenut
ITEM_0098.expl: A nut that produces torrents of smoke. Combine with other items to add more effects.

ITEM_0099.name: Ivy
ITEM_0099.expl: A lightweight and extremely strong plant. Used to make nets for pitfall traps.

ITEM_0100.name: Farcaster
ITEM_0100.expl: Call for a wingdrake to transport you to the nearest camp. Can also be used during combat.

ITEM_0106.name: Balahara Tail
ITEM_0106.expl: A Balahara tail. Its unique, twisted shape allows it to propel itself through earth with great force.

ITEM_0115.name: Wyvern Gem
ITEM_0115.expl: Throughout a wyvern's life, impurities gather and form this peculiar gem.

ITEM_0116.name: Herbivore Shell
ITEM_0116.expl: Part of a shell taken from an herbivore. Relatively sturdy for a small monster material.

ITEM_0121.name: Acute Fang
ITEM_0121.expl: Fangs come in many shapes and sizes. This one is small but can still pierce scale.

ITEM_0122.name: Dung
ITEM_0122.expl: Its eye-watering stench makes useful Slinger ammo.

ITEM_0124.name: Rolled-up Dung
ITEM_0124.expl: A ball of condensed monster dung. Used to make dung pods for your Slinger.

ITEM_0139.name: Toadstool
ITEM_0139.expl: A mushroom with poison properties. Needed to craft poison ammo and smoke bombs.

ITEM_0140.name: Parashroom
ITEM_0140.expl: A mushroom that induces paralysis. Needed to craft paralysis ammo and tranq bombs.

ITEM_0141.name: Sleep Herb
ITEM_0141.expl: A plant containing sleeping agents. Needed to craft sleep ammo and tranq bombs.

ITEM_0142.name: Fire Herb
ITEM_0142.expl: A wondrous, flammable plant. Useful for crafting explosives and Flaming Ammo.

ITEM_0143.name: Flowfern
ITEM_0143.expl: This plant's leaves store a great amount of water. A component for making water ammo.

ITEM_0144.name: Snow Herb
ITEM_0144.expl: A plant that radiates ice-cold air. Use in combinations to create freeze ammo.

ITEM_0145.name: Dragonfell Berry
ITEM_0145.expl: A mysterious berry, rumored for eons to be loathed by dragons. Required to craft Dragon Ammo.

ITEM_0146.name: First-aid Med
ITEM_0146.expl: Restores a small amount of Health. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0149.name: EZ Shock Trap
ITEM_0149.expl: A trap that immobilizes a target. Use it to capture monsters. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0150.name: EZ Pitfall Trap
ITEM_0150.expl: Activates a pitfall to catch monsters with. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0152.name: Might Seed
ITEM_0152.expl: Temporarily strengthens your attacks when ingested by improving energy flow.

ITEM_0153.name: Adamant Seed
ITEM_0153.expl: Temporarily raises your defense when ingested by hardening tissue.

ITEM_0154.name: Nitroshroom
ITEM_0154.expl: A hard-to-find mushroom with the power to generate blazing heat. Required to craft Gunpowder.

ITEM_0156.name: Blastnut
ITEM_0156.expl: A nut that explodes its hard contents on impact. Used to make sticky ammo.

ITEM_0157.name: Slashberry
ITEM_0157.expl: A nut that shatters into razor-like pieces. Used to make slicing ammo.

ITEM_0169.name: Rey Dau Tail
ITEM_0169.expl: A Rey Dau tail. Its Fulgurite- covered spines rub together to produce a threatening melody.

ITEM_0170.name: Rey Dau Plate
ITEM_0170.expl: A Rey Dau plate. The backward- facing scale accumulates a massive amount of energy.

ITEM_0171.name: Tranq Blade
ITEM_0171.expl: A knife coated with a tranquilizer that can be shot from your Slinger to put trapped monsters to sleep.

ITEM_0177.name: Smoke Bomb
ITEM_0177.expl: Creates a large cloud of smoke when thrown against the ground that can hide you from a monster's sight.

ITEM_0180.name: Wyvern Ammo
ITEM_0180.expl: Ammo created through years of research into Wyvern's Fire. Short ranged, but destructive.

ITEM_0181.name: Grounding Pod
ITEM_0181.expl: Slinger ammo that can dissipate electricity from the area it lands.

ITEM_0187.name: Ghillie Mantle
ITEM_0187.expl: Temporarily conceal yourself from view. The effect ends if you perform an attack or take damage.

ITEM_0188.name: Fishing Rod
ITEM_0188.expl: A tool for fishing. Cast the lure into bodies of water and use the reel to wind in the line.

ITEM_0189.name: Energy Drink
ITEM_0189.expl: A Guild-approved beverage that boosts your stamina. Helps shake off sleep, too!

ITEM_0191.name: Immunizer
ITEM_0191.expl: Temporarily boosts your natural ability to recover lost health.

ITEM_0194.name: Demondrug
ITEM_0194.expl: Temporarily boosts your attack power by filling you with demonic strength.

ITEM_0195.name: Might Pill
ITEM_0195.expl: Temporarily endows you with the strength of a mighty god. Potent!

ITEM_0197.name: Armorskin
ITEM_0197.expl: Temporarily boosts your defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

ITEM_0198.name: Adamant Pill
ITEM_0198.expl: Temporarily makes your skin as hard as adamant. Potent!

ITEM_0200.name: Herbal Medicine
ITEM_0200.expl: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

ITEM_0201.name: Herbal Powder
ITEM_0201.expl: Produces a cloud that cures poison and heals you a bit.

ITEM_0202.name: Demon Powder
ITEM_0202.expl: A mysterious powder that produces a cloud around the area that temporarily strengthens attacks.

ITEM_0203.name: Hardshell Powder
ITEM_0203.expl: A mysterious powder; when dispersed, temporarily strengthens defense.

ITEM_0206.name: Poison Smoke Bomb
ITEM_0206.expl: Releases a cloud of toxic mist when used. Also popular as a household bug bomb.

ITEM_0207.name: Tranq Bomb
ITEM_0207.expl: A hand grenade used to capture monsters ensnared in traps. Can be slammed against the ground.

ITEM_0208.name: Throwing Knife
ITEM_0208.expl: A knife that can be equipped to your Slinger. Can be coated with a range of chemicals.

ITEM_0212.name: Drugged Meat
ITEM_0212.expl: Raw meat that puts whatever eats it to sleep. Makes great bait for traps.

ITEM_0215.name: Torch Pod
ITEM_0215.expl: Slinger ammo that can be used to scare away creatures that don't like fire and draw in those that do.

ITEM_0221.name: Paint Pod
ITEM_0221.expl: Slinger ammo that makes a monster or location temporarily easier to find.

ITEM_0222.name: Luring Pod
ITEM_0222.expl: Slinger ammo that can be used to lure monsters toward yourself.

ITEM_0224.name: First-aid Med+
ITEM_0224.expl: Restores a moderate amount of health. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0233.name: EZ Sonic Bomb
ITEM_0233.expl: Slinger ammo that emits an earsplitting sonic blast. Returned after quest completion.

ITEM_0234.name: Tinged Meat
ITEM_0234.expl: Raw meat that paralyzes whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.

ITEM_0237.name: Poisoned Meat
ITEM_0237.expl: Raw meat that poisons whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.

ITEM_0239.name: Kunafa Cheese
ITEM_0239.expl: An artisan cheese made in Kunafa, deliciously gooey when heated, and a great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0241.name: Droolshroom
ITEM_0241.expl: A mushroom that grows in a secret spot known only to Wudwuds. A great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0243.name: Mud Shrimp
ITEM_0243.expl: A nutritious shrimp native to Oilwell Basin and favored in Azuz. A great addition to any dish.

ITEM_0249.name: Wild Herb
ITEM_0249.expl: This herb's refreshing aroma can mask any foul odor. A great finishing touch to any dish.

ITEM_0250.name: Eastern Honey
ITEM_0250.expl: Has a unique flavor, making it the perfect secret ingredient. A great finishing touch to any dish.

ITEM_0251.name: Monster Chili
ITEM_0251.expl: A powerful spice that enhances flavor and sweat production. A great finishing touch to any dish.

ITEM_0257.name: Windward Aloe
ITEM_0257.expl: Found in the Windward Plains, the water stored within its plump leaves has saved many a parched traveler.

ITEM_0258.name: Fine Windward Aloe
ITEM_0258.expl: A rarity from the Windward Plains. A single drop of its delicious sap transforms water into ambrosia.

ITEM_0259.name: Great Windward Aloe
ITEM_0259.expl: A treasure of the Windward Plains. Its leaves hold enough water to fill a bath in the driest desert.

ITEM_0260.name: Sandpepper
ITEM_0260.expl: Found in the Windward Plains, this dried spice lends a rich and aromatic heat to any dish.

ITEM_0261.name: Fiery Sandpepper
ITEM_0261.expl: A rarity from the Windward Plains. A spice so hot that a single bite opens the taster's third eye.

ITEM_0262.name: Fulgurite Shard
ITEM_0262.expl: Found in the Windward Plains, the shape of this Fulgurite was sculpted by a chance lighting strike.

ITEM_0263.name: Pure Fulgurite
ITEM_0263.expl: A rarity from the Windward Plains. Crystallized fulgurite, free of any impurity. Extremely delicate.

ITEM_0264.name: Thundering Fulgurite
ITEM_0264.expl: A treasure of the Windward Plains. A colossal fulgurite crystal, born of a sky-splitting thunderstrike.

ITEM_0284.name: Wylk Pebble
ITEM_0284.expl: Small stones found across the East. A rich source of energy, they are often burned for fuel.

ITEM_0285.name: Wylk Gem
ITEM_0285.expl: A beautiful, faintly luminescent stone occasionally found inside Wylkdrops harvested in the East.

ITEM_0286.name: Time-honed Wylk Gem
ITEM_0286.expl: The size of this rare find from the east is the result of an eons- long natural formation process.

ITEM_0287.name: Ancient Fossil
ITEM_0287.expl: The blackened, stony remains of old bones unearthed in the east. When polished, it gains a velvety sheen.

ITEM_0288.name: Flowing Sea Squirt
ITEM_0288.expl: A species of translucent sea squirts found in the East. When salt-dried, it becomes a fine preserved food.

ITEM_0289.name: Royal Sea Squirt
ITEM_0289.expl: A rare, meatier species of sea squirt found in the East. Keeps its rich flavor, even when preserved.

ITEM_0292.name: Nightflower Pollen
ITEM_0292.expl: Pollen from a flower that blooms under a full moon. It exudes an ethereal pale glow.

ITEM_0293.name: Fossilized Opal
ITEM_0293.expl: A mass of organic material fossilized into opal over time. It has a deep crimson shine.

ITEM_0294.name: Fossilized Fire Opal
ITEM_0294.expl: This gorgeous fossil is marked by an exceptionally clear and fiery opal. A truly radiant rarity.

ITEM_0295.name: Genesis Opal
ITEM_0295.expl: The opal inclusion in this fossil burns with the fire of creation that first shaped this world.

ITEM_0296.name: Wyvernsprout
ITEM_0296.expl: A parasitic fungus that grows on the bodies of dead monsters. Prized as a symbol of reincarnation.

ITEM_0297.name: Whetfish Fin
ITEM_0297.expl: A fish fin that greatly restores sharpness and requires fewer strokes than a whetstone.

ITEM_0298.name: Sushifish Scale
ITEM_0298.expl: A scale from a Sushifish. Slightly restores health and treats bleeding.

ITEM_0304.name: Screamer Pod
ITEM_0304.expl: Used as ammo for your Slinger. Emits a harsh, high-frequency sound that can disrupt sensitive monsters.

ITEM_0316.name: Dragonstrike Nut
ITEM_0316.expl: A nut that explodes on impact. Used to make Wyvern Ammo.

ITEM_0317.name: Bomberry
ITEM_0317.expl: A nut that ruptures on impact. Used to make cluster bombs.

ITEM_0319.name: Chatacabra Scale+
ITEM_0319.expl: A quality Chatacabra scale. Its enhanced durability makes it impervious to most blows.

ITEM_0320.name: Chatacabra Jaw
ITEM_0320.expl: Fine plating from a Chatacabra's hulking jaw. Its density and heft are quite impressive.

ITEM_0321.name: Chatacabra Hide+
ITEM_0321.expl: A high-quality Chatacabra hide. Tempered by its harsh environment. Makes a fine crafting material.

ITEM_0322.name: Chatacabra Hardshell
ITEM_0322.expl: Stout plating from a Chatacabra's arms. Constant friction with the ground has polished it to gleam.

ITEM_0323.name: Chatacabra Certificate S
ITEM_0323.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Chatacabra. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0338.name: Balahara Scale+
ITEM_0338.expl: A high-quality Balahara scale. Thick and durable enough to carve through stone without a scratch.

ITEM_0339.name: Balahara Carapace
ITEM_0339.expl: A hard Balahara carapace. A quality material from a specimen wrapped in pure Fulgurite.

ITEM_0340.name: Balahara Skull+
ITEM_0340.expl: A Balahara's pointy skull. An incredibly tough shell that digs through hard bedrock with ease.

ITEM_0341.name: Balahara Certificate S
ITEM_0341.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Balahara. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0343.name: Doshaguma Fur+
ITEM_0343.expl: Quality Doshaguma fur. So accustomed to harsh climes that it's akin to armor.

ITEM_0344.name: Doshaguma Hide+
ITEM_0344.expl: Quality Doshaguma hide. It's thick, comfortable weight gives reassurance to those who wear it.

ITEM_0345.name: Doshaguma Claw+
ITEM_0345.expl: A sharp Doshaguma claw. One poke will pierce through skin, and one swipe will tear flesh from bone.

ITEM_0346.name: Doshaguma Fang+
ITEM_0346.expl: A sharp Doshaguma fang. Proof of its owner's feral nature in its ability to chew through even bone.

ITEM_0347.name: Doshaguma Certificate S
ITEM_0347.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Doshaguma. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0373.name: Rey Dau Scale+
ITEM_0373.expl: A high-quality Rey Dau scale. Constant exposure to the Sandtide made it as sturdy as it is smooth.

ITEM_0374.name: Rey Dau Carapace
ITEM_0374.expl: The tough carapace of a Rey Dau. Its complex but consistent pattern enhances its conductivity.

ITEM_0375.name: Rey Dau Bolthorn
ITEM_0375.expl: A Rey Dau horn crackling with lightning. Durable enough to sustain great bolts of electricity.

ITEM_0376.name: Rey Dau Boltwingtalon
ITEM_0376.expl: A Rey Dau wingtalon with an azure glow. Coated with pure, razor-sharp Fulgurite.

ITEM_0377.name: Rey Dau Boltgem
ITEM_0377.expl: A rare jewel that developed within a Rey Dau. Said to wield the power of ten thousand storms.

ITEM_0378.name: Rey Dau Certificate S
ITEM_0378.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Rey Dau. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0439.name: Demon Ammo
ITEM_0439.expl: Ammo that produces a cloud that temporarily strengthens attacks in the impact zone of where it lands.

ITEM_0440.name: Armor Ammo
ITEM_0440.expl: Ammo that produces a cloud that temporarily strengthens defense in the impact zone of where it lands.

ITEM_0441.name: Recover Ammo
ITEM_0441.expl: Ammo that produces a healing cloud in the impact zone of where it lands.

ITEM_0442.name: Tranq Ammo
ITEM_0442.expl: Ammo used to capture monsters ensnared in traps.

ITEM_0443.name: Exhaust Ammo
ITEM_0443.expl: Ammo that drains a monster's stamina.

ITEM_0483.name: Large Dung Pod
ITEM_0483.expl: Slinger ammo that releases a strong odor on impact, causing any surrounding monsters to flee.

ITEM_0493.name: Heavy Blunt Pod
ITEM_0493.expl: Slinger ammo that inflicts massive blunt damage where it lands.

ITEM_0494.name: Heavy Severing Pod
ITEM_0494.expl: Slinger ammo that inflicts massive severing damage where it lands.

ITEM_0496.name: Basic Material
ITEM_0496.expl: Assorted materials from target monster obtained as bonus rewards.

ITEM_0497.name: Valuable Material
ITEM_0497.expl: Valuable materials from target monster obtained as bonus rewards.

ITEM_0500.name: Ancient Wyvern Coin
ITEM_0500.expl: A rarity found in the East. A coin bearing a delicate etched relief, long out of use.

ITEM_0514.name: Bulaqchi Carapace
ITEM_0514.expl: A high-quality carapace from a Bulaqchi. Easy to process and incredibly tough.

ITEM_0516.name: Monster Broth
ITEM_0516.expl: A broth made from only the thickest of a monster's juices. Quite rich.

ITEM_0517.name: Talioth Scale+
ITEM_0517.expl: A high-quality scale from a Talioth. Sturdy enough to survive many fierce battles, but still not much to look at.

ITEM_0518.name: Wingdrake Hide+
ITEM_0518.expl: A rare material carved from wingdrakes. It's both tough and easy to work with.

ITEM_0555.name: Rubbery Hide+
ITEM_0555.expl: The quality hide of a Gypceros. The baggy, stretchy feel of it is oddly pleasing to the wearer.

ITEM_0556.name: Gypceros Wing
ITEM_0556.expl: A quality Gypceros wing membrane. Offers the same shock and poison protectionnow with comfy stretch!

ITEM_0557.name: Gypceros Head
ITEM_0557.expl: The uniquely shaped head of a Gypceros. A must-have for Gypceros lovers!

ITEM_0558.name: Gypceros Tail
ITEM_0558.expl: The tail of a Gypceros. The most pliant body part, and thus the most difficult part to damage.

ITEM_0559.name: Gypceros Certificate S
ITEM_0559.expl: A Guild certificate awarded to those who have hunted a Gypceros. Used to make equipment.

ITEM_0560.name: Bird Wyvern Gem
ITEM_0560.expl: A valuable gem that can be harvested from bird wyverns. Said to fetch a high price on the market.

ITEM_0561.name: Dash Extract
ITEM_0561.expl: A mysterious substance culled from certain monsters that increases endurance.

ITEM_0604.name: Lightcrystal
ITEM_0604.expl: A precious and extremely hard substance with a faint glow. Sometimes used for crafting tools.

ITEM_0605.name: Novacrystal
ITEM_0605.expl: High quality Lightcrystal. Highly coveted for its rarity, it's used for only the finest of metalworking.

ITEM_0615.name: Quality Bone
ITEM_0615.expl: A bone used as crafting material. Its ease of use and hardness allow it to be shaped into better gear.

ITEM_0622.name: Torrent Sac
ITEM_0622.expl: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve copious amounts of water.

ITEM_0628.name: Toxin Sac
ITEM_0628.expl: A monster organ filled with an extremely potent toxin. Even one touch can be risky.

ITEM_0648.name: Armor Sphere
ITEM_0648.expl: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a tiny amount.

ITEM_0649.name: Armor Sphere+
ITEM_0649.expl: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a small amount.

ITEM_0650.name: Advanced Armor Sphere
ITEM_0650.expl: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it.

ITEM_0651.name: Hard Armor Sphere
ITEM_0651.expl: A rigid, high-density armor sphere used to solidly help improve armor.

ITEM_0660.name: Catalyst
ITEM_0660.expl: Works with other materials to enhance their effects. Cannot be used by itself.

ITEM_0661.name: Gunpowder
ITEM_0661.expl: A dangerous substance that explodes when struck or heated. Used in Large Barrel Bombs.

ITEM_0662.name: Small Barrel
ITEM_0662.expl: A small, empty barrel. Combine with fire herbs to make it into a bomb.

ITEM_0663.name: Large Barrel
ITEM_0663.expl: A large, empty barrel. Combine with gunpowder to make it into a bomb.

ITEM_0664.name: Spider Web
ITEM_0664.expl: A very sticky web. Used to craft pitfall traps.

ITEM_0665.name: Net
ITEM_0665.expl: A sturdy net that supports a certain amount of weight without breaking. Perfect for pitfall traps.

ITEM_0670.name: Golden Scale
ITEM_0670.expl: A Goldenfish scale. They shimmer like only pure gold can.

ITEM_0671.name: Platinum Scale
ITEM_0671.expl: A Platinumfish scale. They give off a beautiful gleam.

ITEM_0680.name: Heavy Armor Sphere
ITEM_0680.expl: A high density armor sphere. Greatly enhances armor.

ITEM_0681.name: Monster Keenbone
ITEM_0681.expl: Bone obtained from high rank large monsters. It has a razor sharp tip that retains its strength after forging.

ITEM_0682.name: Monster Hardbone
ITEM_0682.expl: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

ITEM_0683.name: Stoutbone
ITEM_0683.expl: The bone of a large, high ranking monster. Very sturdy.

ITEM_0684.name: Great Stoutbone
ITEM_0684.expl: The bone of a large, high ranking monster. Extremely solid and durable.

ITEM_0696.name: Common Wood Minnow
ITEM_0696.expl: A common wooden lure shaped like a small fish. Good for any kind of fish.

ITEM_0702.name: Close-range Coating
ITEM_0702.expl: A coating designed to deal more damage to nearby targets, at the cost of a reduced maximum range.

ITEM_0703.name: Power Coating
ITEM_0703.expl: A coating that increases the attack power of arrows.

ITEM_0704.name: Pierce Coating
ITEM_0704.expl: A coating that increases piercing ability. Depending on the monster, it can deal multiple hits.

ITEM_0705.name: Paralysis Coating
ITEM_0705.expl: A coating that applies paralysis effects to arrows.

ITEM_0706.name: Poison Coating
ITEM_0706.expl: A coating that applies poison effects to arrows.

ITEM_0707.name: Sleep Coating
ITEM_0707.expl: A coating that applies sleep effects to arrows.

ITEM_0708.name: Blast Coating
ITEM_0708.expl: A coating that applies explosive powder to arrows.

ITEM_0709.name: Exhaust Coating
ITEM_0709.expl: A coating that applies a fatigue- inducing fluid to arrows.

ITEM_0730.name: Balahara Black Pearl
ITEM_0730.expl: A jewel formed from ore that spent years inside a Balahara. Bewitchingly beautiful.
